  "Allegations" : "PLAINTIFFS HIRED APPLICANT AS AN INVESTMENT ADVISER.   "Broker Comment" : "THIS ACTION WAS ORIGINALLY FILED IN TEXAS STATE COURT IN NOVEMBER 1991. THIS CASE WAS SETTLED AND DISPOSED OF IN 1994. DUE TO THE AGE OF THIS CASE, COURT DOCUMENTS HAVE BEEN DIFFICULT OR IMPOSSIBLE TO OBTAIN.
